Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

Which version of KSP would you recommend installing to make absolutely full use of RO/RSS and any other realism mod? Also,  wold this version support any of the SpaceX mods? I'm trying to make this game as realistic as possible and hopefully be able to use F9 and its variants.

I don't know, but I know how I'd find out.

I'd go to the RO thread and the RSS thread, and find out what version they're currently released for. Then I'd use that version.

I also don't know about the parts mods, but those tend to be pretty version agnostic. Likely they'll just work.
The modpack rp 0 use 1.3.1 version so i think its one of the greatest version for realism mod
